description.zh: Infisical 是一个开源的密钥管理平台，帮助团队集中并安全地管理应用程序的密钥和配置。它可以防止密钥泄露，并支持在团队和基础设施之间无缝同步。平台还支持内部 PKI、证书管理以及对用户和机器的访问控制。
description.en: Infisical is an open-source secret management platform designed to help teams centralize and securely manage application secrets and configurations. It prevents secret leaks and enables seamless synchronization across teams and infrastructure. The platform also supports internal PKI, certificate management, and secure access control for both users and machines.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 开源平台，具备企业级安全功能
- 集中管理团队的密钥和配置
- 通过扫描和预提交钩子防止密钥泄露
- 支持云端和自托管部署
- 与主流 DevOps 工具和平台集成

## 功能列表:

- 支持跨项目和环境管理密钥的用户界面
- 原生集成 GitHub、Vercel、AWS、Terraform、Ansible 等平台
- 密钥版本控制和时间点恢复功能
- 支持 PostgreSQL、MySQL、AWS IAM 等服务的自动密钥轮换
- 支持 PostgreSQL、MySQL、RabbitMQ 等服务的动态密钥生成
- 密钥扫描和防泄露工具
- Kubernetes Operator 自动注入密钥并重载部署
- Infisical Agent 无需修改代码即可注入密钥
- 私有证书颁发机构（CA）和证书生命周期管理
- 证书过期告警功能
- Kubernetes PKI 发行器支持自动 TLS 证书更新
- 密钥管理系统（KMS）支持加密和解密操作
- 签名的 SSH 证书用于安全访问基础设施
- 多种身份认证方式：Kubernetes、GCP、Azure、AWS、OIDC、通用认证等
- 基于 RBAC 的访问控制、临时访问、审批流程等功能
- 完整的操作审计日志
- 支持本地或云环境自托管
- 提供 Node、Python、Go、Ruby、Java 和 .NET 的 SDK
- 提供 CLI 和 API 便于集成开发和 CI/CD 流程
- 支持 Git 历史扫描和预提交钩子防止密钥泄露
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Open-source platform with enterprise-grade security features
- Centralized secret and configuration management for teams
- Prevents secret leaks with scanning and pre-commit hooks
- Supports both cloud and self-hosted deployment options
- Integrates with popular DevOps tools and platforms

## Features:

- User-friendly dashboard for managing secrets across projects and environments
- Native integrations with GitHub, Vercel, AWS, Terraform, Ansible, and more
- Secret versioning and point-in-time recovery
- Automated secret rotation for PostgreSQL, MySQL, AWS IAM, and more
- Dynamic secret generation for PostgreSQL, MySQL, RabbitMQ, and more
- Secret scanning and leak prevention tools
- Kubernetes Operator for automatic secret delivery and deployment reload
- Infisical Agent for secret injection without code changes
- Private Certificate Authority (CA) and certificate lifecycle management
- Alerting for expiring certificates
- Kubernetes PKI Issuer with automatic TLS certificate renewal
- Key Management System (KMS) for encryption and decryption
- Signed SSH certificates for secure infrastructure access
- Multi-method authentication including Kubernetes, GCP, Azure, AWS, OIDC, and Universal Auth
- Fine-grained access controls with RBAC, temporary access, approval workflows, and more
- Comprehensive audit logs
- Self-hosting support for on-prem or cloud deployments
- SDKs for Node, Python, Go, Ruby, Java, and .NET
- CLI and API for seamless integration into development and CI/CD pipelines
- Git history scanning and pre-commit hooks for secret leak prevention
